com.here.platform.location.core.geospatial.javadsl

Interface LinearRingHolder<P>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - The type of the contained points.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolygonLocation

    public interface LinearRingHolder<P>
    An interface for objects that represent linear ring.

    When using types that implement this interface, other parts of the API will work out-of-the-box. If a type doesn't implement it, a LinearRingAdapter might need to be provided instead.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<P> getPoints()
      Returns the points of the linear ring in order.

    • Method Detail

      • getPoints

        java.util.List<P> getPoints()
        Returns the points of the linear ring in order.

        There is no duplication of the last point at the end of the sequence, i.e. for a triangle this method returns a sequence of three points.
